daily_summary.headline: SpaceX Crew-12 and Starlink Launches Highlight the Day

top_events.title: Falcon 9 Block 5 | Crew-12
top_events.description: SpaceX's Crew-12 mission to the ISS with international astronauts on board.
top_events.action: Watch live on SpaceX's official webcast.

top_events.title: Falcon 9 Block 5 | Starlink Group 17-33
top_events.description: Deployment of 25 Starlink satellites for global internet coverage.
top_events.action: Watch live on SpaceX's official webcast.

top_events.title: Aurora Viewing Opportunity
top_events.description: G1 geomagnetic storm expected, offering aurora visibility at high latitudes.
top_events.action: Check viewing conditions if you are at high latitudes.

opportunities.recommendation: Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65°+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
